author: Laura Hermoza
title: Stoner’s Dairy Farm in the fall
text:
Fall into fun at Stoner's Dairy Farm. (Photo Courtesy of Stoner’s Hijos Hill, Inc. Dairy Farm) View all 6 photos Come out and “ fall ” into fun at Stoner’s Hijos Hill, Inc. Dairy Farm. Now through Nov. 1, you can enjoy Fall Corn Maze Weekends as well as a host of other upcoming slated events .
Last week the farm had planned a Harvest Festival that was cancelled due to inclement weather. Thankfully, some of those events have been moved to today’s daily operations. Enjoy a number of activities happening onsite including live music, puppet and magic shows, pony rides, hayrides, inflatables, a petting zoo, farm tours, pumpkin judging, and so much more. You can view the original Farm Festival announcement on the website here .
Another upcoming featured event happening at Stoner’s is the Cornhole Tournament on Saturday, Oct. 17. The tournament starts at 12:30 p.m. with warm up available from 11:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. Cash prizes will be awarded to first, second, and third place winners at the following levels: $200 (first), $100 (second), and $50 (third). Want to take part in the competition? Register before Oct. 15 and pay $20 a team. Registration after this time will be $30. Concessions will be provided during the tournament. To register, click here .
As mentioned before, Stoner’s presents Fall Corn Maze Weekends with admission hours from noon to 10 p.m. on Saturdays (last admission 9:15 p.m.) and from noon to 5 p.m. on Sundays (last admission 4:15 p.m.). Come out and enjoy all the fun fall follies including a 5-acre corn maze, petting zoo, hayrides, play areas, and a corn cannon where you can get a little target practice in. Enjoy essence of autumn in the way of pumpkins, mums, and other décor and delights. Indulge in delicious ice cream and other yummy treats while in attendance on the farm. Admission to the corn maze is $5 a person. Hayrides are $3. For a combo package that includes the corn maze and the hayride both you pay just $6. Learn more here .
Because fun doesn’t end, even when the sun goes down, Stoner’s presents Flashlight Nights at the maze. Bring a flashlight and find your way through the 5-acre maze in the pitch of night. Other evening enjoyments include roasting marshmallows over an open fire and heading to the barn loft for sweet treats before taking a hayride under the stars. On two select Friday evenings, Oct. 23 and Oct. 30, the maze gets haunted, just in time for Halloween. Learn more by clicking this link . Also be sure to check out Trick-Or-Treat Night on Wednesday, Oct. 28 from 6 p.m. to 8 p.m. This event is designed for safe trick-or-treating within the corn maze. A complimentary candy bag will be available for little ones as they wander the safe haven of the maze to collect their loot. Learn more about this free event here .
Stoner’s Hijos Hill, Inc. Dairy Farm is located at 7678 Oellig Road, Mercersburg, PA 17236. For more information, click here .
